name: WORDKOUR
description:
WORDKOUR - Are You a Parkour Enthusiast Who also likes Word Games ?
Then WORDKOUR is for You !

Solve Word Puzzles while leaping Your way around many, many fun and exciting levels.

Collect the Correct Letters to Spell out the Word of the Level, While using Your Parkour Skills to hop all over the Map.

Each Level gets more Challenging in this Family Friendly Action Game !

The Game features procedurally generated Maps utilizing advanced Artificial intelligence for Optimization.

There are also Puzzle Elements Like Keys and Switches to Solve.

You can also collect Power-Ups Like Health, Super Jump, Flying, and More.

There are also some Mystery Word Levels to add to the Fun !

Now Jump to it !
